target: He was the ONE person I would have liked to have seen in concert.
context: <user> I'm a huge YouTube fan.  That is how Justin Bieber was discovered. <system> Really, I did not know that.  I have watched a few funny things my kids show me. <user> Yes, in 2008 RBMG signed him after discovering videos of him covering songs. <system> That is interesting.  I wonder if many people think they will be discovered that way. <user> I would think so.  His debut EP was RBMG's very first release and went platinum in the US <system> That seems like it worked fantastically for him then. <user> I would say so.  After his first album he had his first healining tour, the My World Tour. <system> He does seem pretty popular.<user> Yes, but I doubt he will ever contribute as much globally to pop culture as michael jackson the king of pop did. <system>
